%2Ferrors.c: returns the posted errors by bots

%2Fping.c: returns the processing time of a request

%2Fstatus.c: returns the status of the pi and some running bots

%2Fvalorantrank%2F%3Ariotid%3Atagline.c: returns the valorantrank from a user (cache: 15m)

%2Ferror.c: pushes a error to the file

%2Fgpio.c: sets the specified raspi-pin to a state
